contest-event.event-date:
April 25, 1971 D Blackpool Contest (B Section)
Blackpool Contest (B Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Blackpool Contest blackpool-contest-b-section
South Pier, Blackpool, Lancashire Best cornet - Newton Heath. Best euphonium - Lancashire Constabulary. Best trombone - Wigan and District. Prizes - 1st £30 and trophy, 2nd £15 and trophy, 3rd £8. 20th annual contest 7 bands competed.
April 9, 2012, 11:29 a.m. April 10, 2017, 8:31 a.m.
1 British Aerospace (Chadderton) T. Lawson Scheherazade
2 Lancashire Constabulary Band Frank Hough Suite Gothique
3 Wigan & District Edward Gray The Seasons [Carr]
4 Poulton-Le-Fylde Band G. G. Lloyd Promenade
Unknown Result Warrington Brass Len Andrews Peter Schmoll
Unknown Result Radcliffe Brass Band Charles Randall Promenade
Unknown Result Whitworth Vale and Healey Band J. Furness Themes from Symphony No. 5 [Beethoven]
